text: Edmondo Mornese (November 14, 1910 in Alessandria – 1962) was an Italian professional football player. He played for 6 seasons (162 games, 5 goals) in the Serie A for Novara Calcio and A.S. Roma. ==Honours== * Serie A champion: 1941/42. ==External links== Category:1910 births Category:1962 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Novara Calcio players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Edmondo Mornese
